title: Crash from Square Root of Power
body:
**Describe the bug**
Certain large exponents cause a crash like:
sqrt(2^(1,024)


**Screenshots/videos**
One higher than this:
![Screenshot_20241002_144037_Calculator](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd5ba8bc-36ae-4d50-aff0-e791b138a5eb)


**Smartphone (please complete the following information):**
 - Device: Samsung Galaxy S22
 - OS: Android 14 OneUI 6.1
 - App version 3.0.1-beta1
 - Language: English
